    @allure.title("Test Transaction API Required Fields")
    def test_required_fields_provided(self, txn_samples, fw_api, required_fields_txn_channel):
        txn_channel = required_fields_txn_channel[1]
        required_fields = required_fields_txn_channel[0]
        UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER = f'tt_required_fields_incl_{txn_channel[1]}_{self.current_timestr}'
    
        # Get Base Transaction
        transaction = copy.deepcopy(txn_samples.BASE_TEST)
        # Remove all optional fields
        txn_fields = list(transaction.keys())
        for f in txn_fields:
            if f not in required_fields.values():
                transaction.pop(f)
        transaction.update({
            'transaction_id_ext': UNIQUE_INDENTIFIER,
            'transaction_channel': str(txn_channel[0])
        })
    
        txn_resp = fw_api.send_transaction(transaction)
    
        # Verify no errors
>       assert not txn_resp.get("error")
